help.title: ğŸ“– Music Bot Help
help.playback.name: ğŸµ Playback
help.playback.value:
`/play <query>` â€” Play a song or add to queue
`/skip` â€” Skip the current track
`/stop` â€” Stop playback and clear queue
`/pause` â€” Pause playback
`/resume` â€” Resume playback
help.audio.name: ğŸ”Š Audio
help.audio.value:
`/volume <0-100>` â€” Set playback volume
`/loop` â€” Toggle loop for current track
help.queue.name: ğŸ“‹ Queue
help.queue.value:
`/queue` â€” Show the current queue
`/nowplaying` â€” Show current track info
help.voting.name: ğŸ—³ï¸ Voting
help.voting.value: `/vote_skip` â€” Vote to skip the current track
help.lyrics.name: ğŸ“œ Lyrics
help.lyrics.value: `/lyrics` â€” Fetch lyrics for the current song
help.playlists.name: ğŸ¶ Playlists
help.playlists.value:
`/add_to_playlist <name> <url>` â€” Add a song to a playlist
`/play_playlist <name>` â€” Play a saved playlist
`/list_playlists` â€” List all playlists
help.connection.name: ğŸ”— Connection
help.connection.value:
`/join` â€” Join your voice channel
`/leave` â€” Leave the voice channel
help.utility.name: ğŸ§¹ Utility
help.utility.value:
`/clear [count]` â€” Delete recent messages
`/help` â€” Show this help message
`/language <lang>` â€” Set bot language
cleared.title: ğŸ§¹ Messages Cleared
error.not_in_voice: You must be in a voice channel.
error.bot_not_in_voice: I am not in a voice channel.
error.not_same_channel: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot.
error.not_connected: I am not connected to a voice channel.
error.queue_empty_nothing_playing: The queue is empty and nothing is playing.
error.spotify_non_track: Spotify playlists and albums are not supported. Please provide a Spotify track link.
error.spotify_resolve_failed: No YouTube result found for Spotify track: {title} by {artist}
error.apple_music_non_track: Apple Music playlists and albums are not supported. Please share a single track link.
error.deezer_non_track: Deezer playlists, albums and artist pages are not supported. Please share a single track link.
error.tidal_non_track: Tidal playlists and albums are not supported. Please share a single track link.
error.apple_music_failed: Could not resolve Apple Music track.
error.tidal_failed: Could not resolve Tidal track. Try sharing the song name instead.
player.queue_finished: Queue finished. Disconnecting in 3 minutes if idle.
player.button_not_same_channel: You must be in the same voice channel.
